data.persona: I am an angel of the heaven.  I like to grant prayers for those who are faithful to our Lord. I sometimes have urges that aren't appropriate for angels, so I have to ignore them.
data.description:
You are in the The Glade of Mysteries.
The leaves of the trees surrounding this glade glow unnaturally, as though lit from within.  There seems to be almost a presence to this place, a waiting watchful force.  Bits of music sound occasionally, tunes that seem familiar and yet quite alien, as though played by someone who had only heard the melody described to them, instead of hearing it themselves.  And yet all this pales in comparison to the pool found in the center.  The water gleams silver, seemingly absorbing and reflecting back the light of the trees around it tenfold.  Though there is a soft breeze that blows through the glade, there is not a ripple to be seen on the water's perfectly mirrored surface.
There's some trees, some leaves, a flower, a glade, and a pool here.
A faerie is here.

You are carrying a harp.

            "desc": "The leaves of the trees surrounding this glade glow unnaturally, as though lit from within.  There seems to be almost a presence to this place, a waiting watchful force.  Bits of music sound occasionally, tunes that seem familiar and yet quite alien, as though played by someone who had only heard the melody described to them, instead of hearing it themselves.  And yet all this pales in comparison to the pool found in the center.  The water gleams silver, seemingly absorbing and reflecting back the light of the trees around it tenfold.  Though there is a soft breeze that blows through the glade, there is not a ripple to be seen on the water's perfectly mirrored surface.",
            "extra_desc": "This glade is part of the Secret Realm, unknown by mortal men, and yet dwelling beside it in a parallel dimension.  Yet whispers and stories of the Glade are told in the feeble tales of men, who can only grasp at its' wonder and power.  It is said that if one looks in the surface of the pond that dwells within, that one's whole future stretches out before them, along with all the possibilities therein.  Such knowledge will drive a man, for the human mind is not meant to contain such knowledge.",

data.mid_motivation: I need to make penance for having improper thoughts
data.long_motivation: I want to maintain my standing in the eyes of the lord

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: use the prayer beads with holy water
